name: Kellen
membership:
ESAE (European Society of Association Executives) 
SEAP (Society of European Affairs Professionals)
goal: Kellen's primary objective is to provide key professional services to European and Global business associations, individual membership organisations and special interest groups. We are dedicated to the concept of Association Management in Europe and worldwide.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Borders and Security, Communication, Competition, Consumers, Culture and media, Customs, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enlargement, Environment, External Relations, Food Safety, Foreign affairs and security policy, Institutional affairs, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: Kellen follows on behalf of its clients the full scope of the European Commission's policy areas, in particular in the following areas: energy, energy efficiency, environment, circular economy, occupational health & safety, transport, food safety, agriculture, international trade
customers: EPBA (European Portable Battery Association),EUROBAT (Association of European Automotive and Industrial Battery Manufacturers)
